name: Siebel eScript: Avoid setting Scripts to Inactive
description: This rule reports artifacts containing eScript with 'Active' flag is set to FALSE.
output:
This rule reports artifacts containing inactive eScript. It reports:
- object full name
- the associated value is the reference of the eScript
rationale:
An eScript set to inactive will be called, but with no effect.
This can be error-prone for the caller, and thus lead to unexpected behavior.
remediation:
Check if the eScript is really needed.
If not, then remove it.
If yes, then set the active flag back to TRUE.
total: Number of added or modified Objects with eScript
alternativeName: Siebel eScript: Avoid setting Scripts to Inactive
